item.title: CVE-2023-2700|2024-02-11T06:06:03.592626 -- n%2Fa -- libvirt
item.description: A vulnerability was found in libvirt. This security flaw ouccers due to repeatedly querying an SR-IOV PCI device's capabilities that exposes a memory leak caused by a failure to free the virPCIVirtualFunction array within the parent struct's g_autoptr cleanup.
